title: Carcinoma of the stomach: gastrectomy
creator_contributor_role: Mayo Clinic Film Library, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cancer - Research

description: Shows radical subtotal and radical total gastrectomy with removal of omentum, lymph nodes and spleen. A preliminary discussion of advances in treatment of carcinoma of the stomach is given by the authors.
